name: collectionbuilder-csv-data
title: CollectionBuilder CSV Data
description: Metadata and data derived from CollectionBuilder CSV. CollectionBuilder-CSV is a template for creating digital collection exhibits using static web technology.

contributors.title: SMG Playing with the Template from the Digital Initiatives, University of Idaho Library

resources.title: CollectionBuilder CSV Metadata Facets
